name: Don't Kill the CEO-Browser Version
description:
A game about a struggling company and a CEO trying not to die in the process. Can you keep the CEO alive?

As of 9/15/2020-The game is nearly complete, but should be beatable. I should have it complete by this week.

9/17/2020-The game is now beatable, but I plan to expand the game to get a more fuller game experience.

Thank you for trying my game, and feel free to leave feedback/suggestions. If your idea is really good, I would want to add it.
